comment:
Complimentary:In this context, complimentary means that vitamin D enhances the absorption of calcium in the body, making it necessary to take both types of pills for optimal effectiveness.
Minimize:To minimize the total time it takes for the medication to be effective means to find the combination of calcium and vitamin D pills that will result in the shortest overall time for the pills to take effect.
Optimal effectiveness:Optimal effectiveness refers to achieving the best possible outcome in terms of the absorption and effectiveness of the medication, in this case, calcium and vitamin D pills.
